Text:
The xkey is a device you put in your xbox 360 and you can play xbox 360 games from a hdd or usb.

i have it and it's very easy to use :) only need a xkey and a copy from your drive *dummy.bin*
and games ofcourse.

for more info:http://www.x360keyforum.com/viewtopic.php?f=5&t=657

*i'm not the maker only a fan*
